mapper.insert: INSERT INTO agent_merchant (agentUserId, merchantId, productInfoId, agentTime, updateTime, status) VALUES (#{agentuserid}, #{merchantid}, #{productinfoid}, #{agenttime}, #{updatetime}, #{status})
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT(si.merchantId),am.agentUserId,si.storeName,si.advertisingPicUrl,pc.typeName FROM agent_merchant am LEFT JOIN store_info si ON am.merchantId = si.merchantId LEFT JOIN product_classify pc ON pc.id = si.productClassifyId WHERE am.agentUserId = #{agentUserId} ORDER BY merchantId

SELECT am.* ,pm.productName,pm.productPicUrl,pm.resalePrice,pm.vipPrice FROM agent_merchant am LEFT JOIN productinfo_manage pm ON pm.id = am.productInfoId AND pm.merchantId = am.merchantId WHERE am.agentUserId = #{agentUserId} ORDER BY merchantId
